September 21, 2016Jason Corns Reading time ~1 minute

How to: apiDoc plugin

Documentation is tedious. It’s necessary, but tedious. When recently tasked with creating a useful, wide-audience documentation site for a Node API server, I discovered apiDoc, which is targeted to this purpose. Following a vernacular similar to jsDoc but addressing the higher API document, apiDoc creates a beautiful blend of in-file documentation and distributed (html) documentation.

So, why jealousy? I have not yet had the opportunity to work on a responsive redesign yet; REALLY jealous of all parties involved!
